name: powerpost
tagline: Tell your agent what to post. It writes, designs, and publishes for you.
description:
Nobody wants to rewrite the same post for every platform and paste it into each app separately. PowerPost lets your OpenClaw agent handle the whole thing.

Tell it what to post. It researches the topic, writes captions that actually fit each platform, generates images if you want them, and publishes to every account you've connected. Works with Instagram, TikTok, X, YouTube, Facebook, LinkedIn, and more as they're added.

You can feed it text, images, or video. There's a deep research mode for when the post actually matters, custom writing styles so it sounds like you, and a draft-first workflow so nothing goes live without your approval. If you'd rather keep a human in the loop, read-only API keys let the agent generate content but can't publish.

network.justification: All API calls go to powerpost.ai REST API for content generation, image generation, and social media publishing

env.POWERPOST_API_KEY: API key for authenticating with the PowerPost API. Get one at https://powerpost.ai/settings/api
env.POWERPOST_WORKSPACE_ID: Workspace ID for scoping content. Find it at https://powerpost.ai/settings/workspaces
